const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    query: {
      bool: {
        should: [
          {
            match: {
              title: 'quick brown fox'
            }
          },
          {
            match: {
              'title.original': 'quick brown fox'
            }
          },
          {
            match: {
              'title.shingles': 'quick brown fox'
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
